long_description: The ENO Hammock repair kit makes it easy to patch holes and tears in your hammock. Kit includes one 4 x 3 in. patch; simply cut the patch to size, peel it off and stick it on your hammock. See-through patch works with all colors of hammocks. Patch won't pull off when stretched and it won't turn gummy in warm weather.
short_description: The ENO Hammock repair kit makes it easy to patch holes and tears in your hammock.
